About
Arjun

Arjun is a Cyber Security Consultant at a global technology firm with over five years of hands-on experience in building and enhancing Security Operations Center (SOC) and Cyber Threat Intelligence (CTI) capabilities for organizations across diverse industries. He brings forth a robust combination of technical and non-technical skills to help design and build modern, automated, and highly scalable Cyber Defense capabilities while continuously serving as a trusted advisor and partner for clients.

Follow @arjuntherajeev
